name: Our Souls Never Sleep
description:
Our Souls Never Sleep A Game by EtherealChaos Enter the realm of restless souls, where nightmares come alive and sleep is just a distant memory.

Note: This game is currently unfinished, and has been modified to be rated E for everyone for a competition. In future versions of the game, it will be a higher rating and will have trigger warnings for depression, suicide, etc. Player discretion is advised. 

------------------------------- Download Instructions
  1. Scroll down to the 'Download' button and click
  2. Go to the downloaded folder on your computer and right-click
  3.  Select "Extract All"
  4. Double click to enter folder
  5.  Double click on the OurSoulsNeverSleep Application

*This game can currently only run on Windows

-------------------------------

Our Souls Never Sleep is a psychological horror game revolving around its story and the puzzles you complete to reveal it. 

Throughout the game you meet vengeful spirits in your dreams, all of whom seem to share two things in common: they all took their own lives, and their souls are trapped in liminal spaces. You come to discover the Echo that whispered their darkest thoughts in the backs of their minds, driving them to the brink. And you start to hear the whispers too.

You will face choices that determine your fate, and the fates of the friends you make along the way. It is by your hand alone that they live... or die.
